mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.gongzuoliang_name as gongzuoliangName ,a.gongzuoliang_types as gongzuoliangTypes ,a.gongzuoliang_content as gongzuoliangContent ,a.gongzuoliang_number as gongzuoliangNumber ,a.gongzuoliang_yesno_types as gongzuoliangYesnoTypes ,a.gongzuoliang_yesno_text as gongzuoliangYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM gongzuoliang a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.gongzuoliang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuoliangName},'%')
and a.gongzuoliang_types = #{params.gongzuoliangTypes}
and a.gongzuoliang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuoliangContent},'%')
and a.gongzuoliang_number >= #{params.gongzuoliangNumberStart}
and a.gongzuoliang_number <= #{params.gongzuoliangNumberEnd}
and a.gongzuoliang_yesno_types = #{params.gongzuoliangYesnoTypes}
and a.gongzuoliang_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuoliangYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
